name: 2D Shooter (szviktor99)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project.

Modifications:

1) You can see the number of your health in the bottom left corner.

2) You can see the number of enemies in the top left corner (below Score and High Score)

3) You can get extra life by picking up the heart symbol. (The maximum number of life is 3)

4) I designed 3 different levels.

5) If you click on "Level Select" in the Main Menu, then the spacecraft will start a bounce animation (I added an on-trigger animation to the spacecraft)

6) I changed the font of the UI (Score, High Score, Number of enemies)

Note: 

The maximum number of life is 3.  

Number of enemies: 

  • Level 1: 10
  • Level 2: 13 
  • Level 3: 17

Credits:

Created by Viktor Szvoreny
